Detailed Description

Author:
Nishant Mehta

Declaration of Radical class (RADICAL is Robust, Accurate, Direct ICA aLgorithm) Note: upper case variables correspond to matrices. do not convert them to camelCase because that would make them appear to be vectors (which is bad!)
